rationale: The segment states a factual event (first appearance) without using an intensified or comparative risk-adjective.
statement_text: This strain of the avian flu made its first appearance in North America in late November in great black backed gulls in Newfoundland, where birds sometimes land after being blown across the Atlantic from Europe.
